messages.content: Okay this is really promising stuff. I'm definitely excited for this.
Let's get things back on track! Happy new year!
oh cool! Must be tiring for [NAME] though. Looking forward to watching them!
I'm really excited for [NAME]. He seems to be continually improving in this stretch of games. I'm hoping he stays up once [NAME] is healthy.
Happy Birthday [NAME]. You wont read this message but itll be here.
BUT SHE WENT TO A HISTORICALLY BLACK COLLEGE AND IS PART OF A BLACK GREEK SORORITY!
cant wait to go through a rebranded version of this pain again in college too
So word is we have eyes on [NAME]... I would be pretty amped to see him with a Jet on his shirt.
2 more trae assists pls another 3 would be delightful as well
I’m gonna need to see that in writing before I celebrate.
Now I know where to do stag party for my friend, finally.
I’m sooo excited for you!! I’m not dating right now but I love hearing someone be all verklempt.
